about_the_game:
"A pet raising simulator on a train, I guess"

In the barren wasteland on the brink of extinction,
the last Train departs, supposedly carrying its passengers in search of a place where they can survive.
A creature named Eilf boards the Train, determined to travel to Spring - the station that has been said to have vanished.

※ About This Game
The Last Train is a pixel RPG which story takes place on a Train and the world outside.
You and the mysterious fellow passengers will need to collect vital supplies to overcome perilous challenges and survive as you journey towards the ruins of Spring.
Along the way, you'll encounter a captivating cast of passengers, forging fleeting yet unforgettable bonds.
Together with your mysterious ally in a jar, unravel the hidden secrets that lie beneath the surface of this strange and arid land.

※ The Train
A comfortable and safe resting place.
It will protect you from the harmful radiation from outside.
Here you will meet some strange passengers.
Talk to them to discover the secrets of The Last Train.



※ The wilderness
The barren wasteland left after the demise.
Unknown radiation constantly damages your body.
Gather as many supplies as you can in the limited time available.
Explore and learn everything you can about this world.



※ Features
  • Play as a fantasy creature, meeting quirky characters with very different personalities.
  • Unfold an engaging and fluid storyline as you explore breathtaking environments and engage in lively dialogue.
  • Embark on an unforgettable adventure through uncharted lands, working together with your companions to survive!
  • Some of your decisions will determine the ultimate fate of you and your companions.

※ Controls
  • Movement: Arrow Keys or WASD
  • Menu: X (Open/Close)
  • Select/Confirm: Z
  • Cancel: X
  • Full Screen/Windowed: Alt+Enter

※ Other Information
Playthrough time: 3-5 Hours
Developer: Carbontea
Publisher: Eternal Dream Studio
Cover Picture: PPMiecoo

Thank you for your time!♥
detailed_description:
About Us

Official Discord:
Game Publisher X/Youtube Account: @eternaldream0v0
Game Developer Bilibili: @碳茶很好喝
Game Developer Weibo: @碳茶
Publisher Homepage: Click here to visit our homepage and follow us for more updates about our upcoming games!


Welcome to Purchase the Game Artbook!

Curated and created by The Last Train's author, Carbontea, the Art Book DLC features memorable moments from the game, offering insights into the creative journey behind this hopeful story. Get a closer look at the world behind the scenes!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: > Intel Pentium III 800 MHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 High Color +
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: > Intel Pentium III 800 MHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 High Color +
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
